intro: Psychotria phaneroneura, commonly known as the showy Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its striking, showy flowers that are typically blue or purple in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in tropical rainforests. Psychotria phaneroneura is also known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine by indigenous communities.
